title:
NNLO fits of top-quark mass using total, single-differential and
  double-differential $t\bar{t}+X$ cross-section data
authors: S. Alekhin, M.V. Garzelli, J. Mazzitelli, S.-O. Moch, O. Zenaiev
abstract:
We describe the fits of the top-quark mass value at NNLO using as input the
double-differential distributions in rapidity and invariant mass of $t\bar{t}$
pairs obtained by the ATLAS and CMS collaborations from unfolding of their
experimental data to the parton level, compared to NNLO theory predictions. We
consider different state-of-the-art PDF sets, finding results of the fits
compatible among each other within uncertainties. On the other hand, we observe
some tension among the fits to different datasets.
